response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled features and benefits that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than $15,000 to you. To secure this opportunity, I am offering you the chance to acquire the product at an exclusive price of $20,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the immense value it brings. If you're interested in learning more about how this product can transform your business or lifestyle, please let me know. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 20000}
